description: Table for the related multi Auth-Cert Denials Dispositions (I RFL 8525) item - denied days disposition.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated coverage for this referral record. Together with REFERRAL_ID, this forms the foreign key to the REVERRAL_CVG_BED table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple denial dispositions that are associated with the referral and the coverage from the REFERRAL_CVG table.

columns.name: DENIED_DISPOSTN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Auth-Cert Coverage Level - Denials Disposition


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
